title: tiruvaruL purivaiyE
sahitya:
tiruvaruL purivaiyE tiruvoTriyUr thyAgEshvara jAyE en tAyE


anupallavi

  tiruvaDiyaladoru tuNaiyil adenru dinam paNivadu tiruvuLam ariyAdA


caraNam    sundara murti vanronDan embirAn tOzhan shangili maNam sheyak-karuNai shei
shentamizh marai shevi kuLirak-kETTu magizh kurunagai matimukha tripurasundara
